document_data.mainbody:
Lord Stautin Lurian was a noble of House Lurian in the city of Procampur in the Vast in the late 14 century DR.
He was a relative of Lord Consul Povalo Lurian, the head of the family.While several members of House Lurian are known, most of their relationships are unknown Stautin is most likely intended to be a son of Povalo and Jasmine Lurian.
He was aged 30 in 1370 DR.
